name: Zombie Games: Arena
description:
'Zombie Games' is track and field game packed with humor and play-ability

Try to beat your friends in this fun and amusing 'Zombie Games'

Compete in several games events

- Javelarm - How far can you throw your own arm! (Javelin Zombie Style)

- Zombie Race - Race down the 100m track (tap the screen to gain speed)

- Head Shot - Throwing your own head has never been so much fun!

- Hurdles - Experience a unique way of avoiding hurdles

Share your best times and furthest throws with your friends and see if you can become the ultimate 'Zombie Games' champion.

Warning - Limbs are subject to falling off, please take your limbs home with you and dispose of accordingly.
